<deploymentStatus>Deployed</deploymentStatus> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>rtdept__c: Department Master contains numerous data elements pertaining to the specifics of each department. Departments are setup within a Division. Departments belong to one and only one Division but may be made up of many Work Centers.</description> <enableActivities>true</enableActivities> <enableBulkApi>true</enableBulkApi> toolingEntityParticle.Label: Description

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Not Applicable
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Division
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__rtdept_div__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The rate used to calculate Standard Labor Ohd Fringe for this Department, during Cost Rollup. This Rate is multiplied by the Standard Labor Fringe to determine the Standard Labor Ohd Fringe (Labor Ohd amount times this rate = Std Labor Ohd Fringe).
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Std Ohd Rate, Fringe
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__rtdept_ohdfrngrate__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The rate used to calculate Simulated Labor Ohd Fringe for this Department, during Cost Rollup. This Rate is multiplied by the Simulated Labor amount to determine the Simulated Labor Ohd Fringe (Labor Ohd amount times this rate = Sim Labor Ohd Fringe).
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Sim Ohd Rate, Fringe
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__rtdept_ohdfrngratesim__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: A value of 'Manual entry' means the program that moves simulated costs/standards to frozen will NOT copy Sim Fringe Ohd Rate to Std Fringe Ohd Rate. A value of 'Copy from Simulated' means the program WILL copy Sim Fringe Ohd Rate to Std Fringe Ohd Rate.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Fringe Ohd Option
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__rtdept_ohdfrngratesimind_pl__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__rtdept__c.rstk__rtdept_ohdfrngratesimind_pl__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>A value of 'Manual entry' means the program that moves simulated costs/standards to frozen will NOT copy Sim Fringe Ohd Rate to Std Fringe Ohd Rate. A value of 'Copy from Simulated' means the program WILL copy Sim Fringe Ohd Rate to Std Fringe Ohd Rate.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Fringe Ohd Option</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Picklist</type> <unique>false</unique> <valueSet> <restricted>false</restricted> <valueSetDefinition> <sorted>false</sorted> <value> <fullName>Copy from Simulated</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Copy from Simulated</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Manual Entry</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Manual Entry</label> </value> </valueSetDefinition> </valueSet> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The rate used to calculate Standard Labor Ohd dollars for this Department, during Cost Rollup. This Rate is multiplied by the Standard Labor amount to determine the Standard Labor Ohd amount (Labor Ohd amount times this rate = Std Labor Ohd amount).
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Std Ohd Rate, Labor
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__rtdept_ohdlabrate__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The rate used to calculate Simulated Labor Ohd dollars for this Department, during Cost Rollup. This Rate is multiplied by the Simulated Labor amount to determine the Simulated Labor Ohd amount (Labor Ohd amount times this rate = Sim Labor Ohd amount).
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Sim Ohd Rate, Labor
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__rtdept_ohdlabratesim__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: A value of 'Copy from Simulated' means the program that moves Simulated costs/standards to frozen WILL copy Sim Labor Ohd Rate to Std Labor Ohd Rate and a value of 'Manual entry' means the program will NOT copy Sim Labor Ohd Rate to Std Labor Ohd Rate.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Labor Ohd Option
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__rtdept_ohdlabratesimind_pl__c

toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__rtdept_simstdsetdate__c
